article_title: Will the Real Mike Pence Please Stand Up?

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Various news reports have fueled speculation that Governor Mike Pence may be preparing to walk away from his Obamacare Medicaid expansion. This speculation comes following his announced he would reject increased federal funding for the state’s pre-K program, citing the federal government’s “intrusion” as a key reason for his decision
